Supplier Address - street address: Woodpecker House Balaclava Road, Fishponds, Bristol, BS16 3LJ
Award Title: Highways England - COVID-19 Fleet Internal Safety Screens
Award Description: The award of Highways England - COVID-19 Fleet Internal Safety Screens , via single tender action, due to the urgency of the requirement inflicted by Covid-19.  This intervention is required to enable both Traffic Officer and Asset Delivery areas to continue to function effectively during COVID-19, and will support all KPIs associated with the service. The requirement was raised for the supply and fitment of protective screens for vehicles across the Highways England fleet.

Award Title: 2-260 Commercial Management, Project Management and Assurance services for Smart Motorways Programme - M62 J10-12
Award Description: Highways England is setting up a direct award contract for the continued provision of commercial management, commercial assurance, programme management and project management services for continued delivery of the M62 J10-12 Smart Motorway Project (SMP). This is an extension and replacement of the current services being delivered by the Consultant (Turner and Townsend) via SPATS contract 2-119. Highways England requires suitably experienced and flexible resources to successfully manage this scheme throughout the commissioning, handover and close out phases of the project.
